Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is designed to significantly enhance productivity and streamline your operations. Given its unique features and capabilities, I believe it could greatly benefit your business. For this exceptional opportunity, I am offering the product to you at an exclusive price of $18000. This is a limited-time offer tailored specifically for you, considering the value this product can bring to your organization. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about how this product can be integrated into your workflow. I look forward to the possibility of working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $18,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $18,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
